title: Please Help....My friend bought me something and this is a legitimate issue
body:
So my friend, Alianoid , gifted me Program Lissandra. However, the base she glides around on on this skin has holes, which triggers a phobia called Trypophobia, a fear/extreme reaction to clusters of holes. (Google it for more information.) I have Trypophobia, my personal reaction being a feeling like tons of ants are crawling on me, and because it was a gift I cant refund it, and I feel bad because i just wasted 10 dollars of his.
Can either :
A.He gets a refund and the skin is deleted from my account or 
B.Warnings are put on skins with holes on them. 

Please, I'm begging you, one of these needs to happen for trypophobes like me.

<3

replies.body:
Unfortunately, Gifts are *non-refundable*, as stated in our [**Refund Policy**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ). We can remove the skin from your account, but we won't be able to refund your friend for the gift. :(

I recommend writing in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our accounts team and link this post in your ticket. I can't promise anything, but I've poked the accounts team about this and we'll see if there's absolutely anything else we can do for you.

I'm not the right person to ask about item B, but if you're feeling especially passionate about it, I'd recommend creating a post on the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) specifically about this item. Let me know if you have any questions.
